data.similar: No similar modules exist at this time.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
GNU Bayonne is similar to other large-scale projects such as
    Festival and Apache, both of which have been granted their own
    namespace. There are several modules which will be interfacing with
    Bayonne using RPC, Bayonne TGI IPC, UDP messages, local files, etc,
    etc. There are also other non-interface modules to assist with
    automating common administration tasks for GNU Bayonne.

    As a result, it will simplify the archive to consolidate all these
    modules within a root-level Bayonne namespace instead of scattering
    them all over the different categories each individual module would
    belong to.
